snippet.title: HELLSLAVE - Sage 2020 Trailer (Real Sega Saturn Hardware)
snippet.description:
This is a retro dad and modern lad exclusive trailer for the fantastic new Sega Saturn homebrew game by XL2 called "HELLSLAVE". The developer XL2 released this demo for the sage 2020 homebrew competition. This game is absolutely fantastic and I recommend everyone to go and download the game and subscribe to XL2 on YouTube for the latest updates. All footage shown in the video is taken from real Sega Saturn hardware. All songs used are for video purposes only and are owned by there respective copy right holders (credits at bottom).

To down load the game and get lots of information about it from the developer XL2 visit the sage page:

https://www.sonicfangameshq.com/forums/showcase/hellslave-project-z-treme.724/

For the latest updates on the game subscribe to XL2 on YouTube and become a member on Sega xtreme:

https://www.youtube.com/user/xl2k2008
https://segaxtreme.net/threads/hellslave-project-z-treme.24483/page-4

Music used in video:

Mad world - Gary Jules (instrumental)
https://youtu.be/ZUtAe5PUKtE

DORAGON - Flesh Field (XL2 edit)
http://www.flesh-field.com/FleshFieldFrameset-2.htm

Charlie Clouser - Dead Silence/Main titles
https://youtu.be/Wfp2KkDioi8
